#summary Describes the planar plottables that have been implemented. See also the list of GenericPlottables.
#labels Module-Blaise,Phase-Implementation

= Functions =

  * `PlaneFunctionGraph`: The graph of a simple function, with one input and one output. The domain is the visible portion of the real axis.

  * `PlaneParametricCurve`: A parametric curve, over a supplied domain (interval in *R*)
  * `PlaneParametricArea`: A parametric area, over a supplied square domain (in *R*^2^)
